name: CEVA Santé Animale
membership: Ceva Santé Animale is member of AnimalHealth Europe (formerly IFAH-Europe)
goal: Ceva Santé Animale discovers, develops, manufactures and markets veterinary vaccines and medicines globally, supported by technical services. Ceva serves veterinarians and animal owners.
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Consumers, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives: Proposal for a Regulation on Veterinay medicinal products; proposal for a Regulation on the manufacture, placing on the market and use of medicated feed; EU Animal welfare policy; Animal health Policy; Trade Policy; Antibiotic resistance initiatives
